ivf_desc1: Our IVF center combines the latest assisted reproduction technologies with a human and personalized approach to maximize your chances of success.
ivf_desc2: With some of the highest success rates in Africa, our state-of-the-art laboratory and team of experts will guide you through every step of your journey.
ivf_desc3: We offer the full range of ART techniques: conventional IVF, ICSI, egg vitrification, preimplantation genetic diagnosis (PGD).
ivf_step1_desc: Comprehensive evaluation with our fertility specialist
ivf_step2_desc: Personalized protocol for optimal egg production
ivf_step3_desc: Advanced IVF or ICSI techniques by our embryologists
ivf_step4_desc: Selection and transfer of the highest quality embryo
ivf_modal_desc: Schedule an appointment with our fertility specialists for a personalized assessment.
ivf_process_subtitle: Achieve Your Dream of Parenthood with IVF in Tunisia
ivf_stage1_desc: Personalized protocol for optimal egg production
ivf_stage1_details: We use individualized stimulation protocols to obtain an optimal number of quality eggs, with daily monitoring through ultrasound and hormone level testing.
ivf_stage2_details: Performed under light anesthesia, this minimally invasive procedure allows for the collection of mature eggs with great precision and maximum comfort.
ivf_stage3_desc: Advanced IVF or ICSI techniques by our embryologists
ivf_stage3_details: Our expert embryologists select the best sperm for optimal fertilization, using EmbryoScope+ incubators for continuous monitoring.
ivf_stage4_desc: Selection and transfer of the highest quality embryo
ivf_stage4_details: The embryo transfer is performed gently with genetic selection if needed (PGD), to maximize pregnancy chances while minimizing risks.
ivf_testimonials_title: SEE THE JOY OF IVF SUCCESS
ivf_testimonials_subtitle: Inspiring journeys and healthy babies thanks to our personalized protocols
ivf_story_1_quote: After 5 years of unsuccessful attempts, our little miracle is finally here thanks to the team's expertise. A difficult journey but so worth it.
ivf_story_2_quote: With male fertility issues, ICSI was our only option. Today we have perfectly healthy twins!
ivf_story_3_quote: As a single woman, I was able to preserve my fertility before my cancer treatment. Today, my dream of motherhood has come true.
ivf_story_4_quote: As carriers of a genetic disease, PGD allowed us to have a perfectly healthy child. Amazing technology!
ivf_benefit3: Daily follow-up by our team of experts
ivf_procedure_classic_overview: Classic IVF involves bringing eggs and sperm together in the laboratory to allow natural fertilization in vitro.
ivf_procedure_classic_approach: Personalized ovarian stimulation, egg retrieval, laboratory fertilization, embryo culture and transfer.
ivf_procedure_classic_outcome: High success rates with good quality embryos. Personalized follow-up at each step of the process.
ivf_procedure_classic_notes: Requires good ovarian reserve and normal semen analysis.
ivf_procedure_icsi_overview: Advanced technique where a sperm is directly injected into the egg, ideal for severe male infertility.
ivf_procedure_icsi_approach: Selection of best sperm (IMSI if needed), microinjection, advanced embryo culture and transfer.
ivf_procedure_icsi_outcome: Effective solution even with very few sperm. Possible use with frozen or testicular sperm.
ivf_procedure_icsi_notes: Can be combined with PGD for genetic screening.
ivf_procedure_vit_overview: Egg cryopreservation method to preserve fertility (medical or social) with excellent survival rates.
ivf_procedure_vit_approach: Ovarian stimulation, retrieval, immediate vitrification of mature eggs. Later thawing for IVF.
ivf_procedure_vit_outcome: Allows to 'stop the biological clock' with results equivalent to fresh eggs.
ivf_procedure_vit_notes: Recommended before 35 for better egg quality.
ivf_procedure_pgd_overview: Genetic analysis of embryos before transfer to prevent hereditary diseases or chromosomal abnormalities.
ivf_procedure_pgd_approach: Standard IVF/ICSI with trophectoderm biopsy (Day 5), genetic analysis and transfer of healthy embryos.
ivf_procedure_pgd_outcome: Drastic reduction of genetic disease risk. Increased rates of ongoing pregnancy.
ivf_procedure_pgd_notes: Reserved for medical indications (genetic history or advanced maternal age).
curve_page_desc: Our fertility specialists provide cutting-edge IVF treatments with high success rates and compassionate care.
